==Trivia==
* "Painter" De Niro's name is a reference to American painter {{W|Robert De Niro Sr.}}, although the role that "Painter" De Niro takes in the story is more reminiscent of De Niro Sr.'s son {{W|Robert De Niro}}, an American actor who starred in the 1974 American epic crime film ''{{W|The Godfather Part II}}''.
